short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes fonts on any web page you visit to Helvetica or a Helvetica-esque font.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Some individuals find reading sans-serif fonts like Helvetica easier. This extension makes that easy by automatically displaying the content of any web page you visit in Helvetica or a similar sans-serif font.
